attributes.action: Use the Alternative vote system to resolve the Brexit impasse - all MPs  vote.
attributes.additional_details: After a first round of voting the proposal receiving the least number of votes is rejected.  The second preferences of MPs voting for the dropped proposal are then used in a recount.  The process continues until one proposal has 50%+.
attributes.background: Parliament will never find an acceptable solution to Brexit with the existing voting system.  The Alternative Vote System will resolve this issue.  A list of potential exit routes should be voted on, by all MPs, ranking their preferences.
